content:
Yes, Xbox Game Pass has a good selection of first-person shooter games. Some of the most popular titles include:

- Halo: The Master Chief Collection
- Doom Eternal
- Wolfenstein II: The New Colossus
- Battlefield V
- Rainbow Six Siege
- Doom (2016)
- Metro Exodus

Additionally, Xbox Game Pass also offers a variety of other genres, so you can try out different games to see what you like. The subscription cost can vary depending on whether you choose the console or PC option, but it might be worth the investment if you are a fan of first-person shooter games.
